table.name: bulk_trailer_build
table.description: Provides information about what shipments were selected and what shipment groups were created during a given run of bulk trailer build.

columns.name: BULK_TRAILER_BUILD_GID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bulk trailer build process.

columns.name: BULK_TRAILER_BUILD_XID
columns.description: External identifier for the bulk trailer build process.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: Start time of the bulk trailer build.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: End time of the bulk trailer build.

columns.name: NUM_SHIPMENTS_SELECTED
columns.description: Number of shipments selected for the bulk trailer build.

columns.name: NUM_SHIPMENTS_BUILT_TO_GROUPS
columns.description: Number of shipments successfully built into shipment groups by the bulk trailer build.

columns.name: NUM_SHIPMENTS_NOT_IN_GROUPS
columns.description: Number of shipments not built into any of the shipment groups by the bulk trailer build.

columns.name: NUM_SHIPMENT_GROUPS_BUILT
columns.description: Number of shipment groups generated by the bulk trailer build process.

columns.name: LOG_PROCESS_ID
columns.description: The log id for the bulk trailer build process.

columns.name: APP_MACHINE_GID
columns.description: Application machine id the process is running on, in order to get the log from the correct machine.
